category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0LoadExpressionInfoForVR
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether only expressions should be loaded ignoring the configuration session information while loading the Variant Rule or Variant Criteria in the configuration view. The Valid Values: -true: While loading the variant rule in configuration view, do not load the configuration session information along with expressions.This is the default value. -false:While loading the variant rule in configuration view, load the configuration session information along with expressions.
